ToneScore

public struct ToneScore: JSONDecodable

The score of a particular tone.

  • id

    A unique number identifying this particular tone.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let id: String
  • name

    The name of this particular tone.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let name: String
  • score

    The raw score of the tone, computed by the algorithms. This can be compared to other raw scores and used to build your own normalizations.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let score: Double
  • init(json:)

    Used internally to initialize a ToneScore model from JSON.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public init(json: JSON) throws
